entry.title: [GRA2][Webhosting] - ~userid access legacy feature removal
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 17, 08:30 - 09:30 UTC

May 16, 06:22 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting offer.

Start time : 17/06/2024 08:30 UTC
End time : 17/06/2024 09:30 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : We plan to remove the ~userid access legacy feature in June 2024.
All links with format http(s)://someovhdomain.tld/~userid will have to be replaced by http(s)://yourowndomain.tld or they will end up displaying a "Site not installed" error page.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX/GRA/SBG][Hosted Exchange] - Mailbox Access
entry.content:
Jun 6, 23:03 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 06/06/2024 22:30 UTC
End time : 06/06/2024 22:58 UTC
Service impact : The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Ex4.mail.ovh.net is again reachable for customers.
Root cause : It was due to a renewal certificate on every exchange servers .

Jun 6, 22:41 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jun 6, 22:40 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 06/06/2024 22:30 UTC
Service impact : Mailbox access from OWA to ex4.mail.ovh.net might be unreachable.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Clusters slowness
entry.content:
Jun 6, 06:00 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 06/06/2024 04:52 UTC
End time : 06/06/2024 04:55 UTC
Root cause : The slowness of the clusters was due to this maintenance https://web-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/hv0rj1w11k14.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 6, 05:19 UTC
Monitoring - Update : Services are back in nominal mode

Jun 6, 04:57 UTC
Identified - Start time : 06/06/2024 04:52 UTC
Service impact : Websites slowness on Cluster011/Cluster003/Cluster006/Cluster021.
Root cause : https://web-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/hv0rj1w11k14
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are fixing this problem.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Clusters degraded services
entry.content:
Jun 5, 13:11 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 05/06/2024 06:09 UTC
End time : 05/06/2024 09:34 UTC
Our technical teams resolved the issue. However, our teams are still working to identify the root cause.
All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 5, 09:34 UTC
Update - Update : Our services have been restored to nominal levels.

Jun 5, 09:24 UTC
Monitoring - Update : Our teams are taking swift action to restore all affected clusters. We will keep you informed when the clusters are fully available.

Jun 5, 08:42 UTC
Identified - We are currently observing degraded performance with website hosting affecting the following clusters : Cluster003/Cluster005/Cluster006/Cluster007/Cluster010/Cluster011/Cluster015/Cluster027/Cluster028/Cluster030/Cluster031.
We are actively monitoring the situation and will update accordingly. We thank you for your patience.

Jun 5, 07:30 UTC
Update - Update : Same issue on Cluster010/Cluster028.

Jun 5, 06:52 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 05/06/2024 06:09 UTC
Service impact : Websites slowness on Cluster003/Cluster005/Cluster006/Cluster007/Cluster011/Cluster015/Cluster027/Cluster030/Cluster031.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigating the issue.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [GRA][WebPaaS] - Infrastructure Maintenance
entry.content:
Jun 4, 23:01 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jun 4, 16:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 4, 09:04 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web PaaS offer.

Start time : 04/06/2024 16:00 UTC
End time : 04/06/2024 23:00 UTC
Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade. However, at one point each project will be reallocated resulting in a short interruption
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHcloud that they will be doing a maintenance on OVHCLOUD-FR-1 region to release the latest features, bug fixes and performance updates.

Thank you for your understanding.
